banner.heading: Build a marketing landing page
banner.createProfessional: Create professional landing pages for ads/marketing:

templates.heading: Access unlimited landing page templates
templates.subHeading: More than 100 available templates that are suitable for all industries. Easily and quickly edit.

contactUs.heading: Want your own exclusively designed landing page?
contactUs.subHeading: We provide specialized services to support businesses in designing exclusive and unique advertising landing pages.

whyChoose.title: Outstanding features of IChiba Landing Page
whyChoose.subTitle: Tối ưu hóa hiệu quả quảng cáo, triển khai các chiến dịch marketing nhanh chóng …..

items.title: Drag-and-drop
items.content: Free to create your landing page with flexible, easy-to-use drag-and-drop tool.

items.title: Multi-platform integration
items.content: Integrate your landing page with mulitple platforms: Google analytics, Google Ads, Website,... to measure conversion efficiency.

items.title: E-commerce integration
items.content: nclude outstanding features to support ecommerce such as: shopping cart, product management, shipping companies, etc.

items.title: Conversion boosters
items.content: Provide a variety of tools to attract user attention and call for actions: Popup, Sticky bar, Form, Live chat, etc.

boostSale.title: Boost sales
boostSale.content: Design landing pages specialized for your product/service to convince customers to make quick purchasing decisions. Optimize conversion rates from advertising and multi-channel.

brandDevelopment.title: Brand Development
brandDevelopment.content: Investing in building landing pages to introduce your brand will increase customer trust and brand awareness.

leadsGathering.title: Lead gathering
leadsGathering.content: Easily measure and collect data about potential customers interested in your products and services. It helps businesses come up with better approaches and care.

ortherGoals.title: Other goals
ortherGoals.content: A complete set of tools allows businesses to quickly and flexibly create landing pages, serving any goal, from advertising to marketing.

productIntroduction.title: New Product Introduction
productIntroduction.content: Highlight new products and services: introduce information, outstanding features, eye-catching images, etc. to call customers for action.

promotions.title: Promotions
promotions.content: Design promotion landing pages, with optimized content and images precisely targeting the right customer base, thereby increasing conversion rates.

buildOptimized.heading: Build optimized advertising landing pages
buildOptimized.subHeading: Freely create your landing page in your own way. Flexible integrate add-on tools to increase customer engagement and optimize conversion rates.

boxGather.heading: Gather customer data
boxGather.subHeading: Easily collect information about potential customers for advertising and sales campaigns.

boxImprove.heading: Improve page loading speed
boxImprove.subHeading: Optimized interface, file compression technology, optimized JS and CSS reduce page loading time.

boxCompatible.heading: Compatible on multiple devices
boxCompatible.subHeading: The interface is compatible with many devices: computers, laptops, phones, and so on to increase user experience.

boxSEO.heading: SEO optimization
boxSEO.subHeading: All available interface templates are designed to be friendly to Google's algorithm, so the page quickly gets to the top of searches.

boxCustomizable.heading: Customizable widgets
boxCustomizable.subHeading: Add components and tools to the landing page, depending on the purpose of your business.

helpBuild.helpYouBuild: help you build professional landing pages in marketing campaigns

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel connection
omnichannel.content: Connect with business sales channels (website, e-commerce platform, etc.) and measurement platforms (Google Analytics, etc.) to update data in real-time.

dataSecurity.title: Data security
dataSecurity.content: Install SSL free. Data is not saved on the landing page but will be redirected directly to the business's archive.

optimized.title: Optimized transmission speed
optimized.content: IChiba OnePlatform connects with leading cloud server partners: Google Cloud, Cloudflare, etc. to keep stable and fast connection.

contact.title: Contact IChiba OnePlatform
contact.subTitle: To own a professional, SEO-standard landing page
